CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 地方；位置；座位；位置；泊位；地点；场所；（小数点后的）位；家；身份；建筑物；名次；恰当位置；适当处所
放置；安放；安置（家庭或工作等）；安顿；安排；委派；任命；投放；下（订单、指示等）；记住；识别；认出；归类；分类；划分；排名次；确定位置；使…处于某位置；寄予（希望、信任等）；以某种态度对待

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可被确定位置的；可被确定年代的；可被安置的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，含义较广泛。指把人或物置于某处，并将其留在该处。
普通用词，指为了某种目的而将人或物放在一定位置上。指物是多指立着放。
指小心地把人或物平放或横放，侧重动作安稳。
较正式用词，指把某物放在一个正确的位置上，侧重动作的正确。
侧重指社会地位较高，工作较为庄重，领取工资的职位。
普通用词，指人的职务，职位，岗位。
指任何不分高低贵贱的职位；有时侧重指在政府、法庭所谋求的职位。
正式用词，一般指雇员或为富有人家工作所担任的职位，现多见于广告中。
一般特指戏剧或小说所写的环境或场所。
指或大或小的地方，既可指供专门用途或特定活动的地点，又可指某一事件的地址。
多指物体相对于其他物体所处的位置或状态。
指某物设置的方向或地点。
常指真实事件或虚构故事发生的地点。
指某物所处的客观位置和周围地区。
含义广泛，最普通用词，既可指很小的地点，又可指很大很远的地方或场所。
指物体在其周围环境中所处的位置或状态，侧重地点或场所的环境特征。
指相对较小的特定地点或事物所在地。

word_group.brief_definition: (尤指根据安排或计划)发生, 进行
一开始；(用于句尾, 谈论某事为何或是否应该做)究竟, 到底, 当初
在适当的位置, 就位；准备妥当
就座；就位；占有（该属于自己的社会）地位
落实到位；到位；正在实施
不在合适的位置, 放错地方；格格不入的；不相称, 不适当的

bilingual.source: A place for us to do sport.

bilingual.target: 这是一个非常棒的地方。

bilingual.source: This is a place for sick people.
My home is the place for me.
bilingual.target: 我的家是适合我的地方。

list.abstract: place（英 [pleɪs]，美 [pleɪs]），英语单词，作名词为地点；地方；座位。作动词为放置；安置；安排。短语搭配有take place（发生）。例句为“It will also be a place for innovation .（它也将是一个创新的地方。）” place名词类近义词有district、seat等，相关反义词有divest。复数为places。
歌手铃木亚美的歌曲《place》，是专辑《LittleCrystal》内的其中一首歌。

yingyinNormal.en: Was that place the sun?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那那个地方是太阳？

yingyinNormal.en: This place is nice. Yeah
yingyinNormal.zh: 这地方不错。是的。

yingyinNormal.en: So, where is this really cool place?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个很酷的地方是在哪里呢？

yingyinNormal.en: There's so much of place in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 世界上有许许多多的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. Some place from before.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道，远古的什么地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Great Caesar's ghost, look at this place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 见鬼了，看看这个地方。

yingyinNormal.en: That's the new Wii! Who's place is this?
yingyinNormal.zh: 新款的任天堂！这是什么地方？

yingyinNormal.en: You know that they're not the same place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你应该知道这是不一样的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: But, hey, Ross, this place is available now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可是这地方马上就能搬进来。

yingyinNormal.en: This place, I mean this house is incredible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这地方，我是说这房间太棒了。

yingyinNormal.en: Gentlemen, is there some place we can talk?
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生们，能找个地方我们谈谈吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Can you believe this place? I miss coffee.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这地方太难以置信了，真怀念咖啡。

yingyinNormal.en: This place is awesome. Everyone is so mean.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇，这地方真吓人，人人都那么吝啬。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on. I just heard about this great place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 走吧，我刚才听到一个很棒的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not exactly a place for a cute little bunny.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那地方可不适合可爱的小兔兔。

yingyinNormal.en: You say you know where this place rests? I do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说你知道那个地方在哪里？没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, have you read the online reviews for this place?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看过网上对这地方的评价吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I went to that tanning place your wife suggested.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去了你老婆推荐的日光浴的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Exactly. Of course, the place is a dump anyways.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对啊，当然，那地方的确像个垃圾场。

yingyinNormal.en: If you're an architect, this is the, place to be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你是一个建筑师，这是最理想的地方。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 位置; 地方; (有某用途的)建筑
放置; 以某种态度对待
(in the first place)究竟; 到底; 首先
(take the place of)代替; 取代
(put in place)落实到位; 正在实施
身份; 地位; 资格
机会; 空缺; 职位
安顿; 安置(家庭或工作)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 摆放；放置；安置；安排；安顿；实习岗位

word_family.mean: n. 地点；地方；座位；位子；排名；名次；广场；短街；处；地位

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (尤指根据安排或计划)发生；进行
在适当的位置；就位；准备妥当
落实到位；到位；正在实施
就座；就位；占有(该属于自己的社会)地位

sense_info_list.zh: 位置; 地方; (有某用途的)建筑

examination_example.sentence: On the other hand, putting your faith in the wrong <highlight>place</highlight> often carries a high price.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，把你的信仰放在错误的地方往往会付出高昂的代价。

examination_example.sentence: In your email you should include time, <highlight>place</highlight> and other relevant information about the ceremony.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你的电子邮件中，你应该包括时间，地点和其他有关仪式的信息。

examination_example.sentence: They can manage to have a job in one <highlight>place</highlight> and a family in another.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以在一个地方有工作，在另一个地方有家庭。

sense_info_list.en: put in or as if in a certain space or position
sense_info_list.zh: 放置; 以某种态度对待

examination_example.sentence: Either freely available from the moment of publication, or paywalled for a year or more so that the publishers can make a profit before being <highlight>placed</highlight> on general release.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要么从发行之日起免费下载，要么在一年或更长时间内付费下载，这样发行商就可以在正式发行前盈利。

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>placing</highlight> too much emphasis on their opinions can ruin a fantastic home purchase.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过分强调他们的观点会毁掉一套完美的购房计划。

examination_example.sentence: The advance is driven in part by vehicle manufacturers, who are <highlight>placing</highlight> big bets on battery-powered electric vehicles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一进步在一定程度上是由汽车制造商推动的，它们在电池驱动的电动汽车上押下了大笔赌注。

examination_example.sentence: Many of the most celebrated national figures have participated in historical events that have taken <highlight>place</highlight> within the EEOB's granite walls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多最著名的国家人物都参与了发生在这栋行政办公楼花岗岩墙内的历史事件。

examination_example.sentence: a shift in the view of fire has taken <highlight>place</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们对火的看法发生了转变

examination_example.sentence: The dearth of moral purpose frames not only the fact of such widespread phone hacking but the terms on which the trial took <highlight>place</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 道德目的的缺失不仅构成了如此广泛的电话窃听行为的事实，也构成了审判的条件。

sense_info_list.zh: (in the first place)究竟; 到底; 首先

examination_example.sentence: The view causes profound problems for our personal and social lives — and in many ways misses the point of arguing in the first <highlight>place</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种观点会给我们的个人和社会生活带来深刻的问题——而且在许多方面，它从一开始就忽略了争论的要点。

examination_example.sentence: The idea's weakness is that it relies on the board of reviewing editors to identify "the papers that need scrutiny" in the first <highlight>place</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个想法的弱点在于，它首先依赖于审查编辑委员会来确定“需要审查的论文”。

examination_example.sentence: They miss the reason why these jobs are so vulnerable to technology in the first <highlight>place</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们没有首先解释为什么这些工作如此容易受到科技的影响。

sense_info_list.zh: (take the place of)代替; 取代

examination_example.sentence: Millennials may not be that interested in taking their <highlight>place</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 千禧一代可能没兴趣取代他们的位置。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>place</highlight> of Thomas Carlyle, Britain nurtured Christopher Hill, EP Thompson and Eric Hobsbawm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国培养了Christopher Hill、EP Thompson和Eric Hobsbawm来替代Thomas Carlyle。

examination_example.sentence: If appropriate pubic policies were in <highlight>place</highlight> to help all women and all families, Sandberg would be no more newsworthy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有适当的公共政策来帮助所有女性和所有家庭，Sandberg就不会那么有新闻价值了。

sense_info_list.zh: (put in place)落实到位; 正在实施

examination_example.sentence: Some countries over the past few years proposing or putting in <highlight>place</highlight> an alphabet soup of new international tax provisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些国家在过去几年提出或落实了一系列新的国际税收规定。

sense_info_list.zh: 身份; 地位; 资格

examination_example.sentence: Take a broader look at our species' <highlight>place</highlight> in the universe, we have an excellent chance of surviving for tens, if not hundreds, of thousands of years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从更广阔的视野来审视我们这个物种在宇宙中的位置，我们即使存活不了几百万年，也很有可能存活几十万年。

sense_info_list.en: a house or flat/apartment; a person's home
give an order for
an available seat or space
a vacancy or available position
sense_info_list.zh: 机会; 空缺; 职位

sense_info_list.en: to find a suitable home, job, etc. for sb
sense_info_list.zh: 安顿; 安置(家庭或工作)

sense_info_list.en: identify by connecting with a certain time, place, or happening

word_usage.usage:
表示“地点；场所；位置”
place指有特定用途或事情发生的地点、场所、城镇、建筑物、地方。
site尤指建筑物的地点、位置，事情发生或有特定用途的地点、场所。
position指位置、方位、恰当的位置。
scene尤指不愉快事件发生的地点、现场。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (尤指根据安排或计划)发生；进行

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 摆放；放置；安置；安排；安顿；实习岗位

word_family.mean: n. 地点；地方；座位；位子；排名；名次；广场；短街；处；地位

sense_info_list.en: a region or space not specified

examination_example.sentence: And this may well prove to be the most significant impact of robotic technology in many <highlight>places</highlight> around the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这很可能被证明是机器人技术在世界许多地方产生的最重要的影响。

examination_example.sentence: He kept looking for the best <highlight>place</highlight> to stay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他一直在寻找最好的住处。

examination_example.sentence: But those <highlight>places</highlight> that want them must be given the chance to make tourist taxes work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，那些想要获得旅游税的地方必须有机会让旅游税发挥作用。

sense_info_list.en: put in or as if in a certain space or position

examination_example.sentence: Too much emphasis had been <highlight>placed</highlight> on one's occupation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们过于强调自己的职业。

examination_example.sentence: Some companies are realizing that <highlight>placing</highlight> the burden of recycling entirely on the consumer is not an effective strategy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些企业意识到，把回收利用以减少浪费的负担全推给消费者并非有效之举。

examination_example.sentence: Too often the blame for ineffective communication is <highlight>placed</highlight> on the side of the journalists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 往往还是将无效沟通归咎于记者。

sense_info_list.en: give an order for
a point in a speech or a piece of writing

examination_example.sentence: What will his <highlight>place</highlight> be in a world where machines beat us in one area after another?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 计算机在世界各个领域不断超越人类，那么他的未来会是怎样的？他是否还会有立足之地？

sense_info_list.en: an available seat or space
a building or area used for a special purpose
appoint to a job or find a job for

word_usage.usage: 表示“代替，取代”，可用take the place of或in place of来表达，注意固定搭配有无定冠词the。

表示“发生，举行”，可用take place表达，注意take place相当于不及物动词，其后不能接宾语，也不能用于被动结构。
婚礼是上个星期天举行的。
误 The wedding was taken place last Sunday.
正 The wedding took place last Sunday.

exam_freq_info.chinese: (place sth on sth)以某种态度对待

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 摆放；放置；安置；安排；安顿；实习岗位

word_family.mean: n. 地点；地方；座位；位子；排名；名次；广场；短街；处；地位

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在适当的位置；就位；准备妥当

sense_info_list.en: a region or space not specified

examination_example.sentence: Forests are spreading in almost all Western countries, with the fastest growth in <highlight>places</highlight> that historically had rather few trees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几乎所有西方国家的森林都在扩张，增长最快的地方是历史上树木很少的地方。

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, data suggests that this is of the best <highlight>places</highlight> to grow up poor in America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，数据表明这是美国穷人成长的最佳场所之一。

examination_example.sentence: The Chetty data shows that neighborhoods and <highlight>places</highlight> mattered for children born in the San Jose area of 1980s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 切蒂的数据显示，20世纪80年代出生在圣何塞地区的儿童所处的社区和地点至关重要。

sense_info_list.en: put in or as if in a certain space or position

examination_example.sentence: In an experiment, a researcher will <highlight>place</highlight> nuts into a can one at a time and then remove them one by one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一项实验中，研究人员将坚果一次一个地放入罐中，然后一个接一个地取出。

examination_example.sentence: Clarke and her colleagues introduced bacteria to floor tiles (瓷砖) and then <highlight>placed</highlight> cookies on the tiles for varying times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Clarke和她的同事将细菌引入地板砖，然后以不同的时间将饼干放在地板砖上。

examination_example.sentence: Five minutes after that, we <highlight>placed</highlight> either bacon or bread on the surface for 5, 30 or 60 seconds, and then measured the number of bacteria transferred to the food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 五分钟后，我们将培根或面包放在表面上5秒、30秒或60秒，然后测量转移到食物上的细菌数量。

sense_info_list.en: give an order for

examination_example.sentence: Larvian women. Meanwhile, rose from 28th <highlight>place</highlight> in 1914 to become the tallest in the world a century later, with an average height of 169.8cm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同时，拉脱维亚女性从1914年的第28位上升到一个世纪后的世界第一，平均身高为169.8厘米。

examination_example.sentence: The results reveal that while Swedes were the tallest people in the world in 1914, Dutch men have risen from 12th <highlight>place</highlight> to claim top spot with an average height of 182.5cm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究结果显示，虽然瑞典人在1914年是世界上最高的人，但荷兰男性却从第12位上升到最高，平均身高182.5厘米。

examination_example.sentence: They want jobs that provide security and flexibility, and they <highlight>place</highlight> relatively little importance on high pay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她们关心的是这份工作能否给她们以安全感、是否具有灵活性，对高薪资的重视程度相对较低。

sense_info_list.en: an available seat or space

examination_example.sentence: Parents and teachers will tell you not to worry when applying for a <highlight>place</highlight> at a university.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母和老师会告诉你在申请大学学位时不要担心。

examination_example.sentence: What is the first decision you should make in preparing to apply for a <highlight>place</highlight> in a university?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在准备申请大学时，你应该做的第一个决定是什么？

sense_info_list.en: a point in a speech or a piece of writing

examination_example.sentence: Her biggest concern is the emphasis American culture <highlight>places</highlight> on thinness and the negative ways that this affects girls today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她最担心的是美国文化对瘦的强调以及这种情况对当今女孩的负面影响。

examination_example.sentence: It's pointless unless there is a repeatable process in <highlight>place</highlight> to turn inspiration into financial performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非有一个可重复的过程，可以将灵感转化为财务业绩，否则这是毫无意义的。

sense_info_list.zh: (place sth on sth)以某种态度对待

examination_example.sentence: Nobody <highlight>places</highlight> much value on the lives of these poor birds or on their meat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有人重视这些可怜的鸟的生命或它们的肉。

word_usage.usage: 表示“代替，取代”，可用take the place of或in place of来表达，注意固定搭配有无定冠词the。

表示“发生，举行”，可用take place表达，注意take place相当于不及物动词，其后不能接宾语，也不能用于被动结构。
婚礼是上个星期天举行的。
误 The wedding was taken place last Sunday.
正 The wedding took place last Sunday.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (尤指根据安排或计划)发生；进行

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: put in or as if in a certain space or position

examination_example.sentence: Every time you make coffee, dry the leftover coffee grounds and keep them in small balls, then <highlight>place</highlight> the balls in the kitchen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次你做咖啡的时候，把剩下的咖啡渣晾干做成小球，然后把小球放在厨房里。

examination_example.sentence: It had already been <highlight>placed</highlight> in a carrier for safety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 安全起见，它已经被放在一辆运输车上了。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>placed</highlight> the chick in the nest, and it quickly calmed down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我把小鸡放在巢里，它很快就安静下来了。

examination_example.sentence: Zafirakou began the project at Alperton Community School, her <highlight>place</highlight> of work for the past twelve years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Zafirakou在Alperton社区学校启动了这个项目，在过去的12年里，她一直在那里工作。

examination_example.sentence: From my <highlight>place</highlight> to Shelton, we have to drive through the quarters, so we'd better leave early to avoid the traffic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从我家到Shelton，我们得开车穿过街区，所以我们最好早点离开，以免交通堵塞。

examination_example.sentence: We hired our bikes from the rental <highlight>place</highlight> at the South Gate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们从南门的租赁处租了自行车。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (确定)顺序; 排名; 名次
(take the place of)代替; 取代
身份; 地位; 资格

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 地点；地方；座位；位子；排名；名次；广场；短街；处；地位

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 一开始；(用于句尾；谈论某事为何或是否应该做)究竟；到底；当初

sense_info_list.en: a region or space not specified

examination_example.sentence: Germany is not the only <highlight>place</highlight> where parents have to pay fines if their children miss school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 德国不是唯一一个如果孩子缺课，家长就得交罚款的地方。

examination_example.sentence: Given more time, you could visit more <highlight>places</highlight> of interest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有更多的时间，你可以参观更多的名胜古迹。

examination_example.sentence: He lost his home in the rainstorm, so he had no <highlight>place</highlight> to sleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在暴雨中失去了家，所以他没有地方睡觉。

sense_info_list.en: put in or as if in a certain space or position

examination_example.sentence: Coca-Cola, for example, <highlight>placed</highlight> the letters of its famous brand further away from each other to show social distancing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，可口可乐将其著名品牌的字母彼此放置得更远，以显示社交距离。

examination_example.sentence: Traffic lights are usually <highlight>placed</highlight> at busy street corners to help control traffic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 交通灯通常设在繁忙的街角，以帮助控制交通。

examination_example.sentence: Someone picked it up and <highlight>placed</highlight> it into an old temple.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人把它捡起来，放在一座古庙里。

examination_example.sentence: The story takes <highlight>place</highlight> just in the town where we lived!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 故事就发生在我们居住的小镇上！

examination_example.sentence: Where may this conversation take <highlight>place</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这段对话可能发生在哪里？

examination_example.sentence: If the weather is good, the lesson may take <highlight>place</highlight> outdoors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果天气好的话，课程可能在户外进行。

sense_info_list.en: the natural or correct position for sth

examination_example.sentence: The cicada finds a <highlight>place</highlight> in the sun to dry its new shell and wings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蝉在太阳下找到了一个地方，来晒干它的新壳和翅膀。

examination_example.sentence: It will park itself in the right <highlight>place</highlight> at the station.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它会自行停在车站的合适位置。

examination_example.sentence: You should put a B.O.B at a <highlight>place</highlight> where you can get it conveniently when disasters happen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该把求生包放在灾害发生时方便取用的地方。

sense_info_list.en: give an order for
sense_info_list.zh: (确定)顺序; 排名; 名次

examination_example.sentence: If you win the 5th <highlight>place</highlight>, what prizes will you get?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你获得第五名，你会得到什么奖励？

examination_example.sentence: Ray Tomlinson may not be as famous as Bill Gates, but he surely has his <highlight>place</highlight> among the geniuses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雷·汤姆林森也许没有比尔盖茨那么出名，但他在天才中肯定占有一席之地。

sense_info_list.zh: (take the place of)代替; 取代

examination_example.sentence: Will was trying to find a good food choice to take the <highlight>place</highlight> of the bread.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 威尔试图找到一种好的食物来代替面包。

examination_example.sentence: They use wood products to take the <highlight>place</highlight> of plastic ones and cloth bags printed with environmental logos.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们用木制品代替塑料制品和印有环保标志的布袋。

examination_example.sentence: A kind of little cars may some day take the <highlight>place</highlight> of today's big ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一天，一种小型汽车可能会取代今天的大型汽车。

sense_info_list.zh: 身份; 地位; 资格

examination_example.sentence: But it holds a special <highlight>place</highlight> in China-US relations, as it has helped both countries get along for the last 50 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但它在中美关系中有着特殊的地位，因为它帮助两国在过去50年里和睦相处。

examination_example.sentence: What is the prize for 2nd <highlight>place</highlight> in Slogan Design Competition?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 标语设计大赛第二名的奖品是什么？

word_usage.usage: 表示“代替，取代”，可用take the place of或in place of来表达，注意固定搭配有无定冠词the。

表示“发生，举行”，可用take place表达，注意take place相当于不及物动词，其后不能接宾语，也不能用于被动结构。
婚礼是上个星期天举行的。
误 The wedding was taken place last Sunday.
正 The wedding took place last Sunday.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指小心地把人或物平放或横放，侧重动作安稳。
较正式用词，指把某物放在一个正确的位置上，侧重动作的正确。
普通用词，含义较广泛。指把人或物置于某处，并将其留在该处。
普通用词，指为了某种目的而将人或物放在一定位置上。指物时多指立着放。
